home.Title: Illini Datathon
home.Application_Description: Applications For The 2019 Datathon Are Now Open

about.Description: A datathon is a celebration of data. In our 2nd annual Datathon, participants will work in teams and be presented a large, complex dataset. They will have 36 hours to apply their quantitative skills to analyze the dataset and tackle an industry problem. Though the competition is the core event of the Datathon, there will also be fun workshops presented from professionals in the field and an informal career fair. So come learn how to apply analytical skills learned in the classroom to real-life data!

workshop.title: Trading Strategy
workshop.description: Ergo, si semel tristior effectus est, hilara vita amissa est? Videsne quam sit magna dissensio? At quicum ioca seria, ut dicitur, quicum arcana, quicum occulta omnia? Sed vobis voluptatum perceptarum recordatio vitam beatam facit, et quidem corpore perceptarum. Nam si amitti vita beatapotest, beata esse non potest. Conferam tecum, quam cuique verso rem subicias;

faq.question: What, When, And Where Is The Datathon?
faq.answer: The Datathon is a weekend long event that will take place from February 15th–February 17th where participants will come together in teams to analyze a complex dataset and solve an industry problem. There will be informal career fair, fun workshops, and meals provided throughout the event. The location is yet to be confirmed.

faq.question: Who Can Attend?
faq.answer: All UIUC undergraduate and graduate students are invited to apply. No background in data science is assumed. However, we will be having a pre-session workshop on Feb 9th from 2-4 pm in Lincoln Hall Theatre to help prepare for the Datathon.

faq.question: What Should I Bring
faq.answer: You should bring a laptop and a couple of copies of you resume if you plan to talk to companies in our informal career fair.

faq.question: What If I Don’t Have A Team?
faq.answer: Once you have been confirmed as a participant for the Datathon, you will be able to log into compass and message other participants who are looking for teams or looking to add to their team.

faq.question: Where Will I Be Able To Work?
faq.answer: You will be allowed to work anywhere on campus. However, we will be providing tables for teams to work.

faq.question: What Is The Cost Of The Datathon?
faq.answer: The Datathon costs $3 for members of Illini Statistics Club and $5 for non-members. Once you have been confirmed as an applicant, we ask that you venmo us at @IlliniStatistics-Club to pay the fees.
